title: An Inconvenient Truth by Al Gore
description: Watch this movie and understand that the clock is ticking and that we're dancing on the volcano! If we don't act now in a concerted, international effort it may be too late to save Spaceship Earth. Who cares about the financial crisis if the whole planet is dying?! Watch this shocking documentary by Al Gore and spread the word before it's too late! It's time that Bush and his cronies from the oil industry are replaced by sane politicians who work in the interest of the people and who understand that man cannot live without the environment. Even the fascist American corporations who do everything they can to brainwash the populace and undermine democracy with the help of the corporate media like FOX and CNN will die if the planet dies! In the words of Chief Seattle: "Only when the last tree has died and the last river has been poisoned and the last fish has been caught will we realise that we cannot eat money."
